Text.Page:
The gulas are trying to spread their evil reach. Those disgusting wretches are using {@LinkCreature:8#3051#kobold hirelings} to do their dirty work.

Even worse, the gulas are trying to teach the kobolds how to cook and eat their enemies!

We need to teach the kobolds how foolish it is to do the gulas' bidding.
Kobolds...they're like gulas, but less fun at parties.
